headline: Can AMAT Lead the Display Market With Advanced OLED and AR/VR Push?
summary: Applied Materials' display business rebounds in fiscal 2025, with Q4 revenues up 68.2% as advanced systems, pricing and OLED demand lift margins.

headline: Applied Materials to Report Fiscal First Quarter 2026 Results on Feb. 12, 2026
summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., Jan. 22, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Applied Materials, Inc. today announced that it will hold its fiscal first quarter 2026 earnings conference call on Thursday, Feb. 12, 2026, at 4:30 p.m. ET / 1:30 p.m. PT. The call will be webcast live at: https://ir.appliedmaterials.com. A replay will be available on the same day beginning at 8:00 p.m. ET / 5:00 p.m. PT. About Applied MaterialsApplied Materials, Inc. headline: Jim Cramer's top 10 things to watch in the stock market Thursday
summary: The S&P 500 advanced this morning as Wall Street cheered signs of easing geopolitical tensions. Traders are also awaiting key inflation data.

headline: Nvidia Stock Is Lagging Behind Other AI Names. Why the Boom’s Darling Is Out of Favor.
summary: Nvidia stock is hovering near the same levels it was at last August, while other companies involved in the artificial-intelligence boom have surged.

headline: 1 Reason to Sell AMAT and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: The past six months have been a windfall for Applied Materials’s shareholders. The company’s stock price has jumped 74.6%, hitting $326.79 per share. This was partly thanks to its solid quarterly results, and the run-up might have investors contemplating their next move.

raw.headline: 1 Reason to Sell AMAT and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
raw.summary: The past six months have been a windfall for Applied Materials’s shareholders. The company’s stock price has jumped 74.6%, hitting $326.79 per share. This was partly thanks to its solid quarterly results, and the run-up might have investors contemplating their next move.
